ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not that easy, requires good organisation and people in numbers. I would normally do it with my guild but when we decided to do this there wasn t enough
ygData.messageBody:
It's not that easy, requires good organisation and people in numbers.

I would normally do it with my guild but when we decided to do this there
wasn't enough of us on, so we invited people from guilds that we have
formed an 'Alliance' with (3-4 small-medium size guilds that do big events
together) our guilds level 50 enchanter has a crown so I guess next time we
do it I would be in for the chance of a crown, but I was still angry about
the way I was treated last night. Instead I got to roll on the Mithril
Greaves that dropped and If I had won I probably would of traded them on.

Madagan

Loaded question;-)

But the point is moot since the decision was made and
the item given.

...would it be possible to get a few buds together to
do this again? Then you'd get the crown....
